Producer: Thomas Logoreci, Greg Watkins, Caveh Zahedi
Synopsis: As he prepares to wed for the third time, a man (Caveh Zahedi) reviews his past problems with women. After moving to Paris and sampling the wares of French prostitutes, he becomes obsessed with sex and continually wrecks his romantic relationships by turning to hookers to satisfy his desires.
Title: I Am a Sex Addict
